title: Clement's first big adventure
name: Clement's first big adventure
description:
A Map by Dacwest2006

From Salt Lake City to Big Sky, MT, and back.

We are trying to plan a trip (september) with nice day hikes, scenic drives, and a discovery of local crafts and traditions. Anyone who wants to help out is welcome!

properties.name: Timpanogos Cave National Monument
properties.description: Posted by System    Timpanogos Cave National Monument has closed for the winter. It will re-open May 13, 2006. Timpanogos Cave National Monument sits high in the Wasatch Mountains. The cave system consists of three spectacularly decorated caverns. Each cavern has unique colors and formations. Helictites and anthodites are just a few of the many dazzling formations to be found in the many chambers. As visitors climb to the cave entrance, on a hike gaining over 1,000 feet in elevation, they are offered incredible views of American Fork Canyon.

properties.name: Yellowstone
properties.description: Posted by System    The vast natural forest of Yellowstone National Park covers nearly 9,000 sq. km; 96% of the park lies in Wyoming, 3% in Montana and 1% in Idaho. Yellowstone contains half of all the world\'s known geothermal features, with more than 10,000 examples. It also has the world\'s largest concentration of geysers (more than 300 geyers, or 2/3 of all those on the planet). Established in 1872, Yellowstone is equally known for its wildlife, such as grizzly bears, wolves, bison and wapitis.
